channel.title: WORKING Amulet of Glory Charges?
channel.description:
Hi, im still kind of new to editing servers, but i think i have the basics down, such as moving things, editing shops and players making and deleting things (ect). Now im trying to find a TuT(s) on how to make amulet of glories work for deltascape (if possible). such as right click "Rub" and have it ask you where to go (Edgeville, Draynor Village, and Al-Kharid). i know theres one more place but it's not needed. My Help Question is: Can someone Help me With the Amulet of Glories? u can make them, but they dont work... and i want them to work Please either post a TuT or PLEASE help me
~Austin
